unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We at Tata Consultancy Services have found great success recruiting from IIT Delhi. Our process, starting 10/10/2024, includes aptitude tests at 10:00 hrs and interviews on 12/10/2024. Focus on candidates strong in AI and Data Science. Rs. 5 LPA starting salary. Remember to factor in summer internships starting May 2025. This is vital for building a future-ready workforce. Good luck, team!
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We at T A T A Consultancy Services have found great success recruiting from I I T Delhi. Our process, starting tenth october two thousand and twenty four, includes aptitude tests at ten zero zero hours and interviews on twelfth october two thousand and twenty four. Focus on candidates strong in A I and Data Science. Rupees five L P A starting salary. Remember to factor in summer internships starting May two thousand and twenty five. This is vital for building a future-ready workforce. Good luck, team!
